meanings.definition: Labanotations: a system of dance notation developed by Rudolf Laban.
meanings.sent1: Studying labanotations helps dancers remember choreography.
meanings.sent2: The dance teacher used labanotations to document the movements.
meanings.sent3: The labanotations on the paper looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her body moved in perfect harmony with the labanotations on the page.
meanings.sent5: Labanotations are like a map guiding dancers through the routine.

meanings.definition: Labanotations: the act of recording dance movements using Laban's notation system.
meanings.sent1: She carefully transcribed the labanotations from the video.
meanings.sent2: Labanotations allow dancers to preserve their performances.
meanings.sent3: The labanotations were so detailed, they even included facial expressions.
meanings.sent4: His notebook was filled with labanotations, capturing every step of the dance.
meanings.sent5: The labanotations danced off the page, bringing the routine to life.
